summary: This is an electronic court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It records the filing of an 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' by an attorney on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating the formal entry of legal representation for her appeal.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The named appellant in the case United States of America v. Maxwell, for whom a Notice of Appearance was filed.

persons.name: David Oscar Markus
persons.context: An Assistant U.S. Attorney listed as a recipient of electronic notice for this court filing.

connections.description: Markus, as an Assistant U.S. Attorney, is on the opposing legal side from Maxwell, the appellant/defendant in the case.

events.title: Notice of Appearance Filed for Maxwell
events.description: An 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' was filed electronically with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is a docket notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 21-770, United States v. Maxwell.
It records the filing of a formal 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' by an attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeal.
Assistant U.S. Attorney David Oscar Markus is listed as a recipient of notice for this filing.
